scripts.clean: pnpm run clean:ruby && pnpm run clean:node
scripts.clean:node: (rm -rf node_modules yarn.lock package-lock.json pnpm-lock.yaml || del node_modules yarn.lock package-lock.json pnpm-lock.yaml)
scripts.clean:all: pnpm run clean:ruby && pnpm run clean:site && pnpm run clean:node
scripts.purge: pnpm run clean:all && echo "\033[32mðŸ§¹ All Clean âœ¨""\033[0m Run ""\033[33mpnpm install""\033[0m to start fresh ðŸ¤©"
